description: This file defines a custom exception class `ProductNotFoundException` for handling cases where a product cannot be found by its ID or a custom message.

classes.name: ProductNotFoundException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception indicating a product was not found.

methods.name: ProductNotFoundException(Long id)
methods.description: Constructor that creates an exception with a message indicating the product ID not found.

methods.name: ProductNotFoundException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that creates an exception with a custom message.
